CustomField.description: Used in a commission reports to show which amount to pay out (based on how much payment has been received in the last quarter).
CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Type, "New Business"), ReceivedAmountLastQuarterTrig__c * CommissionV02Auto__c, ReceivedAmountLastQuarterTrig__c* CommissionV02Auto__c)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Not on Page Layout, do not delete.
CustomField.label: Commission Amount for Last Quarter
